Title: Novel Idea 2
Summary: Plot Summary: In a future world where time travel has been fully established and commercialized, a young physicist named Dr. Ava Kane discovers a flaw in the time-space continuum, the Paradox Shift, which if triggered could eradicate all existence. Ava must convince her cynical mentor, Dr. Edward Bennett, and navigate through a web of corporate politics and intrigue to prevent this apocalypse.

Title: Novel Idea 3
Summary: Main Characters: Dr. Ava Kane - a brilliant, young physicist, and Dr. Edward Bennett - Ava's skeptical and weary mentor.
